Text: The Playboy Mansion (also known as the Playboy Mansion West) was the home of late "Playboy" magazine founder Hugh Hefner.

--------------------
Text: Playboy Mansion:  Located in Holmby Hills, Los Angeles, California, near Beverly Hills, the mansion became famous during the 1970s through media reports of Hefner's lavish parties.
